ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and then he hastily backed away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then he turned back to have recourse to his craftiness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then he turned away in a hurry,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He then turned away, striving in his effort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then turned he away in haste,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then he quickly turned his back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he turned back, walking swiftly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Further, he turned his back, striving hard (against Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he turned his back, striving hard (against Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then turned his back, and tried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then he turned his back, striving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:22]   Then he turned his back, to faith, going about in haste, throughout the land causing corruption.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then turned he away) from faith; and it is also said: from Moses (in haste) to his folk; and it is also said: to think what to do about Moses,
